   22: -module(mnesia2_config_test).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: 
   25: -include("mnesia2_test_lib.hrl").
   26:  
   27: -record(test_table,{i,a1,a2,a3}).
   28: -record(test_table2,{i, b}).
   29: 
   30: -export([
   31: 	all/0,groups/0,init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   32: 	 access_module/1,
   33: 	 auto_repair/1,
   34: 	 backup_module/1,
   35: 	 debug/1,
   36: 	 dir/1,
   37: 	 dump_log_load_regulation/1,
   38: 	
   39: 	 dump_log_update_in_place/1,
   40: 	 event_module/1,
   41: 	 inconsistent_database/1,
   42: 	 max_wait_for_decision/1,
   43: 	 send_compressed/1,
   44: 
   45: 	 app_test/1,
   46: 	
   47: 	 schema_merge/1,
   48: 	 unknown_config/1,
   49: 
   50: 	 dump_log_time_threshold/1,
   51: 	 dump_log_write_threshold/1,
   52: 	 
   53: 	 start_one_disc_full_then_one_disc_less/1,
   54: 	 start_first_one_disc_less_then_one_disc_full/1,
   55: 	 start_first_one_disc_less_then_two_more_disc_less/1,
   56: 	 schema_location_and_extra_db_nodes_combinations/1,
   57: 	 table_load_to_disc_less_nodes/1,
   58: 	
   59: 	 dynamic_basic/1,
   60: 	 dynamic_ext/1,
   61: 	 dynamic_bad/1,
   62: 
   63: 	 init_per_testcase/2,
   64: 	 end_per_testcase/2,
   65: 	 c_nodes/0
   66: 	]).
   67: 
   68: -export([check_logs/1]).
   69: 
   70: -define(init(N, Config),
   71: 	mnesia2_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia2]},
   72: 					   delete_schema,
   73: 					   {reload_appls, [mnesia2]}],
   74: 					  N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   75: -define(acquire(N, Config),
   76: 	mnesia2_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia2]},
   77: 					   delete_schema,
   78: 					   {reload_appls, [mnesia2]},
   79: 					   create_schema,
   80: 					   {start_appls, [mnesia2]}],
   81: 					  N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   82: -define(acquire_schema(N, Config),
   83: 	mnesia2_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia2]},
   84: 					    delete_schema,
   85: 					    {reload_appls, [mnesia2]},
   86: 					    create_schema],
   87: 					  N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   88: -define(cleanup(N, Config),
   89: 	mnesia2_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{reload_appls, [mnesia2]}],
   90: 					  N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   91: -define(trans(Fun),
   92: 	?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:transaction(Fun))).
   93: 
   94: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   95:     mnesia2_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   96: 
   97: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   98:     mnesia2_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   99: 
  100: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  101: 
  102: 
  103: all() -> 
  104:     [access_module, auto_repair, backup_module, debug, dir,
  105:      dump_log_load_regulation, {group, dump_log_thresholds},
  106:      dump_log_update_in_place,
  107:      event_module,
  108:      inconsistent_database, max_wait_for_decision,
  109:      send_compressed, app_test, {group, schema_config},
  110:      unknown_config].
  111: 
  112: groups() -> 
  113:     [{dump_log_thresholds, [],
  114:       [dump_log_time_threshold, dump_log_write_threshold]},
  115:      {schema_config, [],
  116:       [start_one_disc_full_then_one_disc_less,
  117:        start_first_one_disc_less_then_one_disc_full,
  118:        start_first_one_disc_less_then_two_more_disc_less,
  119:        schema_location_and_extra_db_nodes_combinations,
  120:        table_load_to_disc_less_nodes, schema_merge,
  121:        {group, dynamic_connect}]},
  122:      {dynamic_connect, [],
  123:       [dynamic_basic, dynamic_ext, dynamic_bad]}].
  124: 
  125: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  126:     Config.
  127: 
  128: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  129:     Config.
  130: 
  131: 
  132: 
  133: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  134: 
  135: access_module(doc) ->
  136:     ["Replace the activity access module with another module and ",
  137:      "use it to read and write to some alternate table storage"];
  138: access_module(suite) -> [];
  139: access_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  140:     Nodes = ?acquire_schema(1, Config),
  141:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start([{access_module, mnesia2_frag}])),
  142: 
  143:     ?match(mnesia2_frag, mnesia2:system_info(access_module)),
  144: 
  145:     access_tab(ram_copies, Nodes),
  146:     case mnesia2_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
  147: 	true -> skip;
  148: 	false -> 
  149: 	    access_tab(disc_copies, Nodes)
  150: 		,  access_tab(disc_only_copies, Nodes)
  151:     end,
  152: 
  153:     ?verify_mnesia2(Nodes, []),
  154:     ?cleanup(1, Config).
  155: 
  156: access_tab(Storage, Nodes) ->
  157:     Tab = list_to_atom(lists:concat([access_tab_, Storage])),
  158:     RecName = some_access,
  159:     Attr = val,
  160:     TabDef = [{Storage, Nodes},
  161: 	      {type, bag},
  162: 	      {index, [Attr]},
  163: 	      {record_name, RecName}],
  164:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia2:create_table(Tab, TabDef)),
  165: 
  166:     Activity = fun(Kind) ->
  167: 		       A = [Kind, Tab, RecName, Attr, Nodes],
  168: 		       io:format("kind: ~w, storage: ~w~n", [Kind, Storage]),
  169: 		       mnesia2:activity(Kind, fun do_access/5, A)
  170: 	       end,
  171:     ModActivity = fun(Kind, M) ->
  172: 			  io:format("kind: ~w, storage: ~w. module: ~w~n",
  173: 				    [Kind, Storage, M]),
  174: 			  A = [Kind, Tab, RecName, Attr, Nodes],
  175: 			  mnesia2:activity(Kind, fun do_access/5, A, M)
  176: 	       end,
  177:     ?match(ok, Activity(transaction)),
  178:     ?match(ok, Activity({transaction, 47})),
  179:     ?match(ok, ModActivity(transaction, mnesia2)),
  180:     ?match(ok, ModActivity(transaction, mnesia2_frag)),
  181:     
  182:     ?match(ok, Activity(async_dirty)),
  183:     ?match(ok, Activity(sync_dirty)),
  184:     case Storage of
  185: 	ram_copies ->
  186: 	    ?match(ok, Activity(ets));
  187: 	_ ->
  188: 	    ignore
  189:     end.
  190: 
  191: do_access(Kind, Tab, RecName, Attr, Nodes) ->
  192:     Tens = lists:sort([{RecName, 1, 10}, {RecName, 3, 10}]),
  193:     {OptNodes, OptTens} = 
  194: 	case Kind of
  195: 	    transaction -> {Nodes, Tens};
  196: 	    {transaction, _} -> {Nodes, Tens};
  197: 	    async_dirty -> {[], Tens};
  198: 	    sync_dirty -> {[], Tens};
  199: 	    ets -> {[], []}
  200: 	end,
  201:     ?match(RecName, mnesia2:table_info(Tab, record_name)),
  202:     
  203:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:write(Tab, {RecName, 1, 10}, write)),
  204:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 20}, sticky_write)),
  205:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 21}, sticky_write)),
  206:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 22}, write)),
  207:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:write(Tab, {RecName, 3, 10}, write)),
  208: 
  209:     Twos = [{RecName, 2, 20}, {RecName, 2, 21}, {RecName, 2, 22}],
  210:     ?match(Twos, lists:sort(mnesia2:read(Tab, 2, read))),
  211:     
  212:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:delete_object(Tab, {RecName, 2, 21}, sticky_write)),
  213: 
  214:     TenPat = {RecName, '_', 10},
  215:     ?match(Tens, lists:sort(mnesia2:match_object(Tab, TenPat, read))),
  216:     ?match(OptTens, lists:sort(mnesia2:index_match_object(Tab, TenPat, Attr, read) )),
  217:     ?match(OptTens, lists:sort(mnesia2:index_read(Tab, 10, Attr))),
  218:     Keys = [1, 2, 3],
  219:     ?match(Keys, lists:sort(mnesia2:all_keys(Tab))),
  220: 
  221:     First = mnesia2:first(Tab),
  222:     Mid   = mnesia2:next(Tab, First),
  223:     Last  = mnesia2:next(Tab, Mid),
  224:     ?match('$end_of_table', mnesia2:next(Tab, Last)),
  225:     ?match(Keys, lists:sort([First,Mid,Last])),
  226: 
  227:     %% For set and bag these last, prev works as first and next
  228:     First2 = mnesia2:last(Tab),
  229:     Mid2   = mnesia2:prev(Tab, First2),
  230:     Last2  = mnesia2:prev(Tab, Mid2),
  231:     ?match('$end_of_table', mnesia2:prev(Tab, Last2)),
  232:     ?match(Keys, lists:sort([First2,Mid2,Last2])),
  233: 
  234:     ?match([ok, ok, ok], [mnesia2:delete(Tab, K, write) || K <- Keys]),
  235:     W = wild_pattern,
  236:     ?match([], mnesia2:match_object(Tab, mnesia2:table_info(Tab, W), read)),
  237:     ?log("Safe fixed ~p~n", [catch ets:info(Tab, safe_fixed)]),
  238:     ?log("Fixed ~p ~n", [catch ets:info(Tab, fixed)]),
  239:     
  240:     ?match(OptNodes, mnesia2:lock({global, some_lock_item, Nodes}, write)),
  241:     ?match(OptNodes, mnesia2:lock({global, some_lock_item, Nodes}, read)),
  242:     ?match(OptNodes, mnesia2:lock({table, Tab}, read)),
  243:     ?match(OptNodes, mnesia2:lock({table, Tab}, write)),
  244:     
  245:     ok.
  246: 
  247: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  248: auto_repair(doc) ->
  249:     ["Try the auto_repair mechanism on the various disk_logs and dets files.",
  250:      "",
  251:      "The case tests both normal values of the parameter, and also",
  252:      "one crazy value.",
  253:      "The test of the real auto_repair functionality is made in the",
  254:      "dets suite"
  255:     ];
  256: auto_repair(suite) -> [];
  257: auto_repair(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  258:     ?init(1, Config),
  259:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start()),			% Check default true
  260:     ?match(true, mnesia2:system_info(auto_repair)),
  261:     ?match(stopped, mnesia2:stop()),
  262:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start([{auto_repair, true}])),
  263:     ?match(true, mnesia2:system_info(auto_repair)),
  264:     ?match(stopped, mnesia2:stop()),
  265:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start([{auto_repair, false}])),
  266:     ?match(false, mnesia2:system_info(auto_repair)),
  267:     ?match(stopped, mnesia2:stop()),
  268:     ?match({error, {bad_type, auto_repair, your_mama}},
  269: 	   mnesia2:start([{auto_repair, your_mama}])),
  270:      ?match(stopped, mnesia2:stop()),
  271:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  272:     ok.
  273: 
  274: 
  275: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  276: 
  277: backup_module(doc) ->
  278:     ["Replace the backup module with another module and use it to",
  279:      "read and write to an alternate backup media, e.g stored in",
  280:      "the internal state of a simple process."];
  281: backup_module(suite) -> [];
  282: backup_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  283:     Nodes = ?acquire_schema(1, Config),
  284:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start([{backup_module, mnesia2_config_backup}])),
  285:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  286: 	   mnesia2:create_table(test_table,
  287: 			       [{disc_copies, Nodes},
  288: 				{attributes,
  289: 				 record_info(fields,test_table)}])),
  290:     
  291:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  292: 	   mnesia2:create_table(test_table2,
  293: 			       [{disc_copies, Nodes},
  294: 				{attributes,
  295: 				 record_info(fields,test_table2)}])),
  296:     %% Write in test table 
  297:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia2:write(#test_table{i=1}) end),
  298:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia2:write(#test_table{i=2}) end),
  299:     
  300:     %% Write in test table 2
  301:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia2:write(#test_table2{i=3}) end),
  302:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia2:write(#test_table2{i=4}) end),
  303:     mnesia2_test_lib:sync_tables(Nodes, [test_table, test_table2]),
  304:     
  305:     File = whow,
  306:     %% Now make a backup
  307:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:backup(File)),
  308: 
  309:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:install_fallback(File)),
  310:     
  311:     %% Now add things
  312:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia2:write(#test_table{i=2.5}) end),
  313:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia2:write(#test_table2{i=3.5}) end),
  314: 
  315:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Nodes),
  316:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  317:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:start_mnesia2(Nodes, [test_table, test_table2])),
  318: 
  319:     %% Now check newly started tables
  320:     ?match({atomic, [1,2]},
  321: 	   mnesia2:transaction(fun() -> lists:sort(mnesia2:all_keys(test_table)) end)),
  322:     ?match({atomic, [3,4]},
  323: 	   mnesia2:transaction(fun() -> lists:sort(mnesia2:all_keys(test_table2)) end)),
  324: 
  325:     %% Test some error cases
  326:     mnesia2:set_debug_level(debug),
  327:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia2:install_fallback("NonExisting.FILE")),
  328:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia2:install_fallback(filename:join(mnesia2_lib:dir(), "LATEST.LOG"))),
  329: 
  330:     %% Cleanup
  331:     file:delete(File),
  332:     ?verify_mnesia2(Nodes, []),
  333:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  334:     ok.
  335: 
  336: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  337: debug(doc) ->
  338:     ["Try out the four debug levels and ensure that the",
  339:     "expected events are generated."];
  340: debug(suite) -> [];
  341: debug(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  342:     Nodes = ?init(1, Config),
  343:     case application:get_env(mnesia2,debug) of
  344: 	undefined ->
  345: 	    ?match(none, mnesia2:system_info(debug));
  346: 	{ok, false} ->
  347: 	    ?match(none, mnesia2:system_info(debug));
  348: 	{ok, true} ->
  349: 	    ?match(debug, mnesia2:system_info(debug));
  350: 	{ok, Env} ->
  351: 	    ?match(Env, mnesia2:system_info(debug))
  352:     end,
  353: 
  354:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start([{debug, verbose}])),
  355:     ?match(verbose, mnesia2:system_info(debug)),
  356:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Nodes),
  357:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  358: 
  359:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start([{debug, debug}])),
  360:     ?match(debug, mnesia2:system_info(debug)),
  361:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Nodes),
  362:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  363: 
  364:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start([{debug, trace}])),
  365:     ?match(trace, mnesia2:system_info(debug)),
  366:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Nodes),
  367:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  368: 
  369:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start([{debug, true}])),
  370:     ?match(debug, mnesia2:system_info(debug)),
  371:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Nodes),
  372:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  373: 
  374:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start([{debug, false}])),
  375:     ?match(none, mnesia2:system_info(debug)),
  376: 
  377:     ?verify_mnesia2(Nodes, []),
  378:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  379:     ok.
  380: 
  381: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  382: dir(doc) ->
  383:     ["Try to use alternate Mnesia2 directories"];
  384: dir(suite) -> [];
  385: dir(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  386:     Nodes = ?init(1, Config),
  387: 
  388:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start([{dir, tuff}])),
  389:     Dir = filename:join([element(2, file:get_cwd()), "tuff"]),
  390:     ?match(Dir, mnesia2:system_info(directory)),
  391:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Nodes),
  392:  
  393:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  394:     ok.
  395: 
  396: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  397: dump_log_update_in_place(doc) ->
  398:     ["Change the update in place policy for the transaction log dumper."];
  399: dump_log_update_in_place(suite) -> [];
  400: dump_log_update_in_place(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  401:     Nodes = ?acquire(1, Config),
  402:     ?match(true, mnesia2:system_info(dump_log_update_in_place)),
  403:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  404: 	   mnesia2:create_table(test_table,
  405: 			       [{disc_copies, Nodes},
  406: 				{attributes,
  407: 				 record_info(fields,test_table)}])),
  408:     
  409:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Nodes),
  410:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  411:     
  412:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start([{dump_log_update_in_place, false}])),
  413:     ?match(false, mnesia2:system_info(dump_log_update_in_place)),
  414: 
  415:     mnesia2_test_lib:sync_tables(Nodes, [schema, test_table]),
  416: 
  417:     %% Now provoke some log dumps
  418: 
  419:     L = lists:map(
  420: 	  fun(Num) ->
  421: 		  %% Write something on one end ...
  422: 		  mnesia2:transaction(
  423: 		    fun() ->
  424: 			    mnesia2:write(#test_table{i=Num}) end
  425: 		   ) end,
  426: 	  lists:seq(1, 110)),
  427:     
  428:     L2 = lists:duplicate(110, {atomic, ok}),
  429: 
  430:     %% If this fails then some of the 110 writes above failed
  431:     ?match(true, L==L2),
  432:     if  L==L2 -> ok;
  433: 	true -> 
  434: 	    ?verbose("***** List1 len: ~p, List2 len: ~p~n",
  435: 		      [length(L), length(L2)]),
  436: 	    ?verbose("L: ~p~nL2:~p~n", [L, L2])
  437:     end,
  438:     
  439:     %% If we still can write, then Mnesia2 is probably alive
  440:     ?trans(fun() -> mnesia2:write(#test_table{i=115}) end),
  441:     
  442:     ?verify_mnesia2(Nodes, []),
  443:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  444:     ok.
  445: 
  446: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  447: 
  448: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  449: dump_log_write_threshold(doc)->
  450:     ["This test case must be rewritten.",
  451:      "Dump logs are tested by doing transactions, then killing Mnesia2 and ",
  452:      "then examining the table data files and see if they are correct.",
  453:      "The test_table is used as a counter, test_table. is stepped once ",
  454:      "for each transaction."];
  455: dump_log_write_threshold(suite)->[];
  456: dump_log_write_threshold(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  457:     [N1] = ?acquire_schema(1, Config),
  458: 
  459:     Threshold = 3,
  460:     ?match(ok,mnesia2:start([{dump_log_write_threshold, Threshold}])),
  461: 
  462:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  463: 	   mnesia2:create_table(test_table,
  464: 			       [{disc_copies, [N1]},
  465: 				{attributes,
  466: 				 record_info(fields,test_table)}])),
  467:     ?match(dumped, mnesia2:dump_log()),
  468:     
  469:     ?match(ok, do_trans(2)),				% Shall not have dumped
  470:     check_logs(0),
  471:     
  472:     ?match(ok, do_trans(Threshold - 2)),			% Trigger a dump
  473:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  474:     check_logs(Threshold),
  475: 
  476:     
  477:     ?match(ok, do_trans(Threshold - 1)),   
  478:     ?match(dumped, mnesia2:dump_log()),   %% This should trigger ets2dcd dump
  479:     check_logs(0),                       %% and leave no dcl file
  480:     
  481:     ?match(stopped, mnesia2:stop()),
  482: 
  483:     %% Check bad threshold value
  484:     ?match({error,{bad_type,dump_log_write_threshold,0}},
  485: 	   mnesia2:start([{dump_log_write_threshold,0}])),
  486: 
  487:     ?verify_mnesia2([], [N1]),
  488:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  489:     ok.
  490: 
  491: 
  492: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  493: dump_log_time_threshold(doc)->
  494:     ["See doc on above."];
  495: dump_log_time_threshold(suite)->[];
  496: dump_log_time_threshold(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  497:     Nodes = ?acquire_schema(1, Config),
  498:     Time = 4000,
  499: 
  500:     %% Check bad threshold value
  501:     ?match({error,{bad_type,dump_log_time_threshold,0}},
  502: 	   mnesia2:start([{dump_log_time_threshold,0}])),
  503:     
  504:     
  505:     ?match(ok,mnesia2:start([{dump_log_write_threshold,100},
  506: 			    {dump_log_time_threshold, Time}])),
  507:     
  508:     ?match({atomic,ok},mnesia2:create_table(test_table,
  509: 					   [{disc_copies, Nodes},
  510: 					    {attributes,
  511: 					     record_info(fields,
  512: 							 test_table)}])),
  513:     
  514:     %% Check that nothing is dumped when within time threshold
  515:     ?match(ok, do_trans(1)),
  516:     check_logs(0),
  517:     
  518:     ?match(Time, mnesia2:system_info(dump_log_time_threshold)),
  519: 
  520:     %% Check that things get dumped when time threshold exceeded
  521:     ?match(ok, do_trans(5)),
  522:     receive after Time+2000 -> ok end,
  523:     check_logs(6),
  524:     
  525:     ?verify_mnesia2([node()], []),
  526:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  527:     ok.
  528: 
  529: %%%%%%%%
  530: %% 
  531: %% Help functions for dump log
  532: 
  533: %% Do a transaction N times
  534: do_trans(0) -> ok;
  535: do_trans(N) ->
  536:     Fun = fun() ->
  537: 		  XX=incr(),
  538: 		  mnesia2:write(#test_table{i=XX})
  539: 	  end,
  540:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia2:transaction(Fun),
  541:     do_trans(N-1).
  542: 
  543: %% An increasing number
  544: incr() ->
  545:     case get(bloody_counter) of
  546: 	undefined -> put(bloody_counter, 2), 1;
  547: 	Num -> put(bloody_counter, Num+1)
  548:     end.
  549: 
  550: %%
  551: %% Check that the correct number of transactions have been recorded.
  552: %%-record(test_table,{i,a1,a2,a3}).
  553: check_logs(N) ->    
  554:     File = mnesia2_lib:tab2dcl(test_table),    
  555:     Args = [{file, File}, {name, testing}, {repair, true}, {mode, read_only}],
  556: 
  557:     if N == 0 ->
  558: 	    ?match(false, mnesia2_lib:exists(File));
  559:        true ->
  560: 	    ?match(true, mnesia2_lib:exists(File)),
  561: 	    ?match({ok, _Log}, disk_log:open(Args)),
  562: 	    
  563: 	    {Cont, Terms} = disk_log:chunk(testing, start),
  564: 	    ?match(eof, disk_log:chunk(testing, Cont)),
  565: 	    %%?verbose("N: ~p, L: ~p~n", [N, L]),
  566: 	    disk_log:close(testing),
  567: 	    
  568: 	    %% Correct number of records in file
  569: 	    ?match({N, N}, {N, length(Terms) -1 })  %% Ignore Header
  570:     end.
  571: 
  572: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  573: 
  574: dump_log_load_regulation(doc) ->
  575:     ["Test the load regulation of the dumper"];
  576: dump_log_load_regulation(suite) ->
  577:     [];
  578: dump_log_load_regulation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  579:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  580:     Param = dump_log_load_regulation,
  581: 
  582:     %% Normal 
  583:     NoReg = false,
  584:     ?match(NoReg, mnesia2:system_info(Param)),
  585:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:stop_mnesia2(Nodes)),
  586: 
  587:     %% Bad
  588:     Bad = arne_anka,
  589:     ?match({error, {bad_type, Param, Bad}},
  590: 	   mnesia2:start([{Param, Bad}])),
  591: 
  592:     %% Regulation activated
  593:     Reg = true,
  594:     ?match(ok,mnesia2:start([{Param, Reg}])),
  595:     ?match(Reg, mnesia2:system_info(Param)),
  596: 
  597:     Args =
  598: 	[{db_nodes, Nodes},
  599: 	 {driver_nodes, Nodes},
  600: 	 {replica_nodes, Nodes},
  601: 	 {n_drivers_per_node, 5},
  602: 	 {n_branches, length(Nodes) * 10},
  603: 	 {n_accounts_per_branch, 5},
  604: 	 {replica_type, disc_copies},
  605: 	 {stop_after, timer:seconds(15)},
  606: 	 {report_interval, timer:seconds(3)},
  607: 	 {use_running_mnesia2, true},
  608: 	 {reuse_history_id, true}],
  609:     
  610:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia2_tpcb:start(Args)),
  611:     
  612:     ?verify_mnesia2(Nodes, []),
  613:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  614:     ok.
  615:

  621:     ["Provoke Mnesia2 to make a forced decision of the outome",

  626: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  627: 
  628: send_compressed(doc) -> [];
  629: send_compressed(suite) -> [];
  630: send_compressed(Config) ->
  631:     [N1,N2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  632:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia2:create_table(t0, [{ram_copies,[N1,N2]}])),
  633:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia2:create_table(t1, [{disc_copies,[N1,N2]}])),
  634:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia2:create_table(t2, [{disc_only_copies,[N1,N2]}])),
  635: 
  636:     Max = 1000,
  637:     Create = fun(Tab) -> [mnesia2:write({Tab, N, {N, "FILLER-123490878345asdasd"}})
  638: 			  || N <- lists:seq(1, Max)],
  639: 			 ok
  640: 	     end,
  641:     
  642:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([N2])),
  643:     sys:get_status(mnesia2_monitor), %% sync N1
  644:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([N1])),
  645:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start([{send_compressed, 9}])),
  646:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:wait_for_tables([t0,t1,t2], 25000)),
  647: 
  648:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:transaction(Create, [t0])),
  649:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:transaction(Create, [t1])),
  650:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:transaction(Create, [t2])),
  651:     
  652:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:start_mnesia2([N2], [t0,t1,t2])),
  653:     
  654:     Verify = fun(Tab) ->		     
  655: 		     [ [{Tab,N,{N,_}}] = mnesia2:read(Tab, N) || N <- lists:seq(1, Max)],
  656: 		     ok
  657: 	     end,
  658:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, transaction, [Verify, [t0]])),
  659:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, transaction, [Verify, [t1]])),
  660:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, transaction, [Verify, [t2]])),
  661:     
  662:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, transaction, [Verify, [t0]])),
  663:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, transaction, [Verify, [t1]])),
  664:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, transaction, [Verify, [t2]])),
  665:     
  666:     ?verify_mnesia2(Nodes, []),
  667:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  668:     ok.
  669:

  674:     ok.

  678: event_module(doc) ->
  679:     ["Replace the event module with another module and use it as",
  680:      "receiver of the various system and table events. Provoke",
  681:      "coverage of all kinds of events."];
  682: event_module(suite) -> [];
  683: event_module(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  684:     Filter = fun({mnesia2_system_event,{mnesia2_info, _, _}}) -> false;
  685: 		(_) -> true
  686: 	     end,
  687:     
  688:     [_N1, N2]=Nodes=?acquire_schema(2, Config),
  689: 
  690:     Def = case mnesia2_test_lib:diskless(Config) of 
  691: 	      true -> [{event_module, mnesia2_config_event},
  692: 		       {extra_db_nodes, Nodes}];
  693: 	      false  ->
  694: 		  [{event_module, mnesia2_config_event}]
  695: 	  end,
  696: 
  697:     ?match({[ok, ok], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia2, start, [Def])),
  698:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  699:     mnesia2_event ! {get_log, self()},
  700:     DebugLog1 = receive 
  701: 		    {log, L1} -> L1
  702: 		after 10000 -> [timeout]
  703: 		end,
  704:     ?match([{mnesia2_system_event,{mnesia2_up,N2}}],
  705: 	   lists:filter(Filter, DebugLog1)),
  706:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([N2]),
  707:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  708: 
  709:     ?match({[ok], []}, rpc:multicall([N2], mnesia2, start, [])),
  710: 
  711:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
  712:     mnesia2_event ! {get_log, self()},
  713:     DebugLog = receive 
  714: 		   {log, L} -> L
  715: 	       after 10000 -> [timeout]
  716: 	       end,
  717:     ?match([{mnesia2_system_event,{mnesia2_up,N2}},
  718: 	    {mnesia2_system_event,{mnesia2_down,N2}},
  719: 	    {mnesia2_system_event,{mnesia2_up, N2}}],
  720: 	   lists:filter(Filter, DebugLog)),
  721:     ?verify_mnesia2(Nodes, []),
  722:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  723:     ok.
  724: 
  725: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  726: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  727: start_one_disc_full_then_one_disc_less(doc)->
  728:     ["Start a disk node and then a disk less one. Distribute some",
  729:      "tables between them."];
  730: start_one_disc_full_then_one_disc_less(suite) -> [];
  731: start_one_disc_full_then_one_disc_less(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  732:     [N1, N2] = ?init(2, Config),
  733:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:create_schema([N1])),
  734:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:start_mnesia2([N1])),
  735: 
  736:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:add_table_copy(schema, N2, ram_copies)),
  737: 
  738:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, start, [[{schema_location, ram},
  739: 					     {extra_db_nodes, [N1]}]])),
  740:     mnesia2_test_lib:sync_tables([N1, N2], [schema]),
  741: 
  742:     %% Now create some tables
  743:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  744: 	   mnesia2:create_table(test_table,
  745: 			       [{ram_copies, [N1, N2]},
  746: 				{attributes,
  747: 				 record_info(fields,test_table)}])),
  748:     
  749:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  750: 	   rpc:call(
  751: 	     N2, mnesia2,create_table, [test_table2,
  752: 				      [{ram_copies, [N1, N2]},
  753: 				       {attributes,
  754: 					record_info(fields,test_table2)}]])),
  755: 
  756:     %% Write something on one end ...
  757:     Rec = #test_table{i=55},
  758:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  759: 	   mnesia2:transaction(fun() -> mnesia2:write(Rec) end)),
  760:     
  761:     %% ... and read it in the other
  762:     ?match({atomic, [Rec]},
  763: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, transaction, 
  764: 		    [fun() -> mnesia2:read({test_table, 55}) end])),
  765:     
  766:     
  767:     %% Then do the same but start at the other end
  768:     Rec2 = #test_table2{i=155},
  769:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  770: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, transaction, 
  771: 		    [fun() ->
  772: 			     mnesia2:write(Rec2) end
  773: 		    ])),
  774:     
  775:     ?match({atomic, [Rec2]},
  776: 	   mnesia2:transaction(fun() -> mnesia2:read({test_table2, 155}) end)),
  777:     
  778:     ?verify_mnesia2([N1, N2], []),
  779:     ?cleanup(2, Config),
  780:     ok.
  781:     
  782: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  783: start_first_one_disc_less_then_one_disc_full(doc)->
  784:     ["no_doc"];
  785: start_first_one_disc_less_then_one_disc_full(suite) -> [];
  786: start_first_one_disc_less_then_one_disc_full(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  787:     [N1, N2] = Nodes = ?init(2, Config),
  788:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:create_schema([N1])),
  789:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:start_mnesia2([N1])),
  790: 
  791:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:add_table_copy(schema, N2, ram_copies)),
  792:     
  793:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, start, [[{schema_location, ram},
  794: 					     {extra_db_nodes, Nodes}]])),
  795: 
  796:     mnesia2_test_lib:sync_tables([N1, N2], [schema]),
  797:     
  798:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Nodes),
  799:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
  800:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:start_mnesia2(Nodes)),
  801: 
  802:     mnesia2_test_lib:sync_tables([N1, N2], [schema]),
  803:     
  804:     %% Now create some tables
  805:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  806: 	   rpc:call(
  807: 	     N1, mnesia2,create_table, [test_table,
  808: 				       [%%{disc_copies, [node()]},
  809: 					{ram_copies, [N1, N2]},
  810: 					{attributes,
  811: 					 record_info(fields,test_table)}]])),
  812:     mnesia2_test_lib:sync_tables([N1, N2], [test_table]),
  813: 
  814:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  815: 	   rpc:call(
  816: 	     N2, mnesia2,create_table, [test_table2,
  817: 				       [%%{disc_copies, [node()]},
  818: 					{ram_copies, [N1, N2]},
  819: 					{attributes,
  820: 					 record_info(fields,test_table2)}]])),
  821:     
  822:     mnesia2_test_lib:sync_tables([N1, N2], [test_table, test_table2]),
  823: 
  824:     %% Assure tables loaded
  825:     ?match({[ok, ok], []},
  826: 	   rpc:multicall([N1, N2], mnesia2, wait_for_tables,
  827: 			 [[schema, test_table, test_table2], 10000])),
  828:     
  829:     %% Write something on one end ...
  830:     Rec = #test_table{i=55},
  831:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  832: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, transaction, 
  833: 		    [fun() -> mnesia2:write(Rec) end])),
  834:     
  835:     %% ... and read it in the other
  836:     ?match({atomic, [Rec]},
  837: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, transaction, 
  838: 		    [fun() -> mnesia2:read({test_table, 55}) end])),
  839:     
  840:     %% Then do the same but start at the other end
  841:     Rec2 = #test_table2{i=155},
  842:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  843: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, transaction, 
  844: 		    [fun() ->
  845: 			     mnesia2:write(Rec2) end
  846: 		    ])),
  847:     
  848:     ?match({atomic, [Rec2]},
  849: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, transaction, 
  850: 		    [fun() -> mnesia2:read({test_table2, 155}) end])),
  851:     
  852:     ?verify_mnesia2(Nodes, []),
  853:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
  854:     ok.
  855: 
  856: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  857: start_first_one_disc_less_then_two_more_disc_less(doc)->
  858:     ["no doc"];
  859: start_first_one_disc_less_then_two_more_disc_less(suite) -> [];
  860: start_first_one_disc_less_then_two_more_disc_less(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  861:     Nodes = [N1, N2, N3] = ?init(3, Config),
  862: 
  863:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, start, [[{schema_location, ram}]])),
  864: 
  865:     %% Really should use test_lib:mnesia2_start for these ones but ...
  866:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
  867: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia2,add_table_copy, [schema, N2, ram_copies])),
  868:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
  869: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia2,add_table_copy, [schema, N3, ram_copies])),
  870:     
  871:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, start, [[{schema_location, ram},
  872: 					     {extra_db_nodes, [N1]}]])),
  873:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia2, start, [[{schema_location, ram},
  874: 					     {extra_db_nodes, [N1, N2]}]])),
  875: 
  876:     %% Now create some tables
  877:     ?match({atomic,ok},
  878: 	   rpc:call(
  879: 	     N1, mnesia2,create_table, [test_table,
  880: 				      [%%{disc_copies, [node()]},
  881: 				       {ram_copies, [N1, N2, N3]},
  882: 				       {attributes,
  883: 					record_info(fields,test_table)}]])),
  884: 
  885:     %% Assure tables loaded
  886:     ?match({[ok, ok, ok], []},
  887: 	   rpc:multicall([N1, N2, N3], mnesia2, wait_for_tables,
  888: 			 [[test_table], 1000])),
  889: 
  890:     %% Write something on one end ...
  891:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  892: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, transaction, 
  893: 		    [fun() -> mnesia2:write(#test_table{i=44}) end])),
  894: 
  895:     %% Force synchronicity
  896:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  897: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, transaction, 
  898: 		    [fun() -> mnesia2:write_lock_table(test_table) end])),
  899:     
  900:     %% ... and read it in the others
  901:     ?match({[{atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]},
  902: 	     {atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]}], []},
  903: 	   rpc:multicall([N2, N3], mnesia2, transaction, 
  904: 			 [fun() -> mnesia2:read({test_table, 44}) end])),
  905:     
  906:     %% Then do the other way around
  907:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  908: 	   rpc:call(N3, mnesia2, transaction, 
  909: 		    [fun() -> mnesia2:write(#test_table{i=33}) end])),
  910:     %% Force synchronicity
  911:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  912: 	   rpc:call(N3, mnesia2, transaction, 
  913: 		    [fun() -> mnesia2:write_lock_table(test_table) end])),
  914:     
  915:     ?match({[{atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]},
  916: 	     {atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]}], []},
  917: 	   rpc:multicall([N1, N2], mnesia2, transaction, 
  918: 			 [fun() -> mnesia2:read({test_table, 44}) end])),
  919: 
  920:     mnesia2_test_lib:reload_appls([mnesia2], Nodes),
  921:     ok.
  922: 
  923:

  986:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  987: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, transaction, 
  988: 		    [fun() -> mnesia2:write_lock_table(test_table) end])),
  989:     
  990:     %% ... and read it in the others
  991:     ?match({atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]},
  992: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, transaction, 
  993: 		    [fun() -> mnesia2:read({test_table, 44}) end])),
  994: 
  995:     ?cleanup(2, Config),
  996:     ok.
  997:     
  998: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  999: schema_merge(doc) ->
 1000:     ["Provoke various schema merge situations.",
 1001:      "Perform various schema updates while some nodes are down,",
 1002:      "stop the started nodes, start the stopped nodes and perform",
 1003:      "schema updates. Now we have a situation were some of the table",
 1004:      "definitions have been changed on two or more nodes independently",
 1005:      "of each other and when mnesia2 on the nodes tries to connect",
 1006:      "to each other at restart the schema will be merged.",
 1007:      "Do also try to provoke schema merge situations were the",
 1008:      "schema cannot be merged."];
 1009: 
 1010: schema_merge(suite) -> [];
 1011: 
 1012: schema_merge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1013:     [N1, N2]=Nodes=?acquire(2,Config),
 1014:     
 1015:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([N2]),    
 1016:     receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 1017: 
 1018:     Storage = mnesia2_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),    
 1019:     ?match({atomic,ok},
 1020: 	   rpc:call(
 1021: 	     N1, mnesia2,create_table, 
 1022: 	     [test_table,
 1023: 	      [{Storage, [N1]},
 1024: 	       {attributes,
 1025: 		record_info(fields,test_table)}]])),
 1026:     
 1027:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1028: 	   rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, transaction, 
 1029: 		    [fun() -> mnesia2:write(#test_table{i=44}) end])),
 1030: 
 1031:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([N1]),
 1032:     receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 1033:     %% Can't use std start because it waits for schema
 1034:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, start, [])),
 1035: 
 1036:     ?match({atomic,ok},
 1037: 	   rpc:call(
 1038: 	     N2, mnesia2,create_table, 
 1039: 	     [test_table2,
 1040: 	      [{Storage, [N2]},
 1041: 	       {attributes,
 1042: 		record_info(fields,test_table2)}]])),
 1043:     
 1044:     receive after 5000 -> ok end,
 1045: 
 1046:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1047: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, transaction, 
 1048: 		    [fun() -> mnesia2:write(#test_table2{i=33}) end])),
 1049:     
 1050:     %% Can't use std start because it waits for schema
 1051:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, start, [])),
 1052: 
 1053:     %% Assure tables loaded
 1054:     ?match({[ok, ok], []},
 1055: 	   rpc:multicall([N1, N2], mnesia2, wait_for_tables,
 1056: 			 [[schema, test_table, test_table2], 10000])),
 1057:     
 1058:     %% ... and read it in the others
 1059:     ?match({[{atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]},
 1060: 	     {atomic, [{test_table, 44, _, _, _}]}], []},
 1061: 	   rpc:multicall([N1, N2], mnesia2, transaction, 
 1062: 			 [fun() -> mnesia2:read({test_table, 44}) end])),
 1063:     
 1064:     ?match({[{atomic, [{test_table2, 33, _}]},
 1065: 	     {atomic, [{test_table2, 33, _}]}], []},
 1066: 	   rpc:multicall([N1, N2], mnesia2, transaction, 
 1067: 			 [fun() -> mnesia2:read({test_table2, 33}) end])),
 1068:     
 1069:     ?verify_mnesia2(Nodes, []),
 1070:     ?cleanup(2, Config),
 1071:     ok.
 1072: 
 1073: 
 1074: -define(connect(Nodes), mnesia2:change_config(extra_db_nodes, Nodes)).
 1075: -define(rpc_connect(From, Nodes), 
 1076: 	rpc:call(From, mnesia2, change_config, [extra_db_nodes, Nodes])).
 1077: 
 1078: 
 1079: sort({ok, NS}) ->
 1080:     {ok, lists:sort(NS)};
 1081: sort(Ns) when is_tuple(Ns) ->
 1082:     Ns;
 1083: sort(NS) when is_list(NS) -> 
 1084:     lists:sort(NS).
 1085: 
 1086: 
 1087: 
 1088: 
 1089: dynamic_basic(suite) -> [];
 1090: dynamic_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1091:     Nodes = [N1, N2, N3] = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1092:     SNs = lists:sort(Nodes),    
 1093: 
 1094:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(tab1, [{ram_copies, Nodes--[N1]}, {disc_copies, [N1]}])),
 1095:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(tab2, [{disc_copies, Nodes}])),
 1096: 
 1097:     ?match({ok, SNs}, sort(?rpc_connect(N1, Nodes))),     %% What shall happen?
 1098:     ?match({ok, []}, sort(?rpc_connect(N1, [nonode@nothosted]))),  %% What shall happen?
 1099:     
 1100:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([N2])),
 1101:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:delete_schema([N2])),
 1102: 
 1103:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write({tab1, 1, 1})),
 1104:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write({tab2, 1, 1})),
 1105:    
 1106:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, start, [[{extra_db_nodes, [N1]}]])),
 1107:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab1,tab2],5000])),
 1108:     io:format("Here ~p ~n",[?LINE]), 
 1109:     check_storage(N2, N1, [N3]),
 1110:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1111:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1112: 
 1113:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([N3])),
 1114:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:delete_schema([N3])),
 1115:     
 1116:     io:format("T1 ~p ~n",[rpc:call(N3,?MODULE,c_nodes,[])]),
 1117:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia2, start, [])),
 1118:     io:format("T2 ~p ~n",[rpc:call(N3,?MODULE,c_nodes,[])]),
 1119:     timer:sleep(2000),
 1120:     io:format("T3 ~p ~n",[rpc:call(N3,?MODULE,c_nodes,[])]),
 1121:     ?match({ok, [N1]}, sort(?rpc_connect(N3, [N1]))),
 1122:     io:format("T4 ~p ~n",[rpc:call(N3,?MODULE,c_nodes,[])]),
 1123:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab1,tab2],5000])),
 1124:     io:format("Here ~p ~n",[?LINE]), 
 1125:     check_storage(N3, N1, [N2]),
 1126:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1127:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1128:     
 1129:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([N3])),
 1130:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:delete_schema([N3])),
 1131:     
 1132:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia2, start, [])),
 1133:     ?match({ok, [N3]}, sort(?rpc_connect(N1, [N3]))),
 1134:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N3, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab1,tab2],5000])),
 1135:     io:format("Here ~p ~n",[?LINE]), 
 1136:     check_storage(N3, N1, [N2]),
 1137:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1138:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1139: 
 1140:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([N2]),
 1141:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:delete_schema([N2])),
 1142:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:del_table_copy(schema, N2)),
 1143: 
 1144:     % Ok, we have now removed references to node N2 from the other nodes
 1145:     % mnesia2 should come up now.
 1146:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:add_table_copy(tab1, N2, ram_copies)),
 1147: 
 1148:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, start, [])),
 1149:     ?match({ok, _}, sort(?rpc_connect(N2, [N3]))),
 1150:     
 1151:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1152:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1153:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1154: 
 1155:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab1], 1000])),
 1156:     ?match([{tab1, 1, 1}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, dirty_read, [tab1, 1])),
 1157:        
 1158:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([N2]),
 1159: 
 1160:     %%% SYNC!!!
 1161:     timer:sleep(1000),
 1162:     sys:get_status(mnesia2_monitor),
 1163: 
 1164:     ?match([N3,N1], sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1165:     ?match([N3,N1], sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1166:     
 1167:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, start, [])),
 1168:     ?match({ok, _}, sort(?rpc_connect(N3, [N2]))),
 1169:     
 1170:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1171:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1172:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1173: 
 1174:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab1], 1000])),
 1175:     ?match([{tab1, 1, 1}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, dirty_read, [tab1, 1])),
 1176: 
 1177:     ?verify_mnesia2(Nodes, []),
 1178: %%    ?cleanup(3, Config).
 1179:     ok.
 1180: 
 1181: c_nodes() -> 		  						
 1182:     {mnesia2_lib:val({current, db_nodes}),mnesia2_lib:val(recover_nodes)}.
 1183: 
 1184: 
 1185: dynamic_ext(suite) ->    [];
 1186: dynamic_ext(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1187:     Ns = [N1,N2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1188:     SNs = lists:sort([N1,N2]),
 1189:     
 1190:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(tab0, [{disc_copies, [N1,N2]}])),
 1191:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(tab1, [{ram_copies, [N2]}])),
 1192:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(tab2, [{disc_copies, [N2]}])),
 1193:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(tab3, [{disc_only_copies, [N2]}])),
 1194:     
 1195:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([N2]),
 1196:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:delete_schema([N2])),
 1197:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, start, [[{extra_db_nodes, [N1]}]])),
 1198:     
 1199:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1200:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1201:     
 1202:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab0,tab1,tab2,tab3], 2000])),
 1203: 
 1204:     Check = fun({Tab,Storage}) ->
 1205: 		    ?match(Storage, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, table_info, [Tab, storage_type])),
 1206: 		    ?match([{N2,Storage}], 
 1207: 			   lists:sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, table_info, [Tab, where_to_commit])))
 1208: 	    end,
 1209:     [Check(Test) || Test <- [{tab1, ram_copies},{tab2, disc_copies},{tab3, disc_only_copies}]],
 1210:     
 1211:     T = mnesia2_time:unique_integer(),
 1212:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write({tab0, 42, T})),
 1213:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write({tab1, 42, T})),
 1214:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write({tab2, 42, T})),
 1215:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write({tab3, 42, T})),
 1216:     
 1217:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, stop, [])),
 1218:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, start, [])),
 1219:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1220:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:wait_for_tables([tab0,tab1,tab2,tab3], 10000)),
 1221:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab1,tab2,tab3], 100])),
 1222:     ?match([], mnesia2:dirty_read({tab1, 41})),
 1223:     ?match([{tab2,42,T}], mnesia2:dirty_read({tab2, 42})),
 1224:     ?match([{tab3,42,T}], mnesia2:dirty_read({tab3, 42})),
 1225: 
 1226:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([N2]),
 1227:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:delete_schema([N2])),
 1228: 
 1229:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, stop, [])),
 1230: 
 1231:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, start, [[{extra_db_nodes,[N1,N2]}]])),
 1232:     ?match({timeout,[tab0]}, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab0], 500])),
 1233: 
 1234:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, start, [[{extra_db_nodes, [N1,N2]}]])),
 1235:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab0], 1500])),
 1236:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab0], 1500])),
 1237:     ?match([{tab0,42,T}], mnesia2:dirty_read({tab0, 42})),
 1238:     ?match([{tab0,42,T}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia2,dirty_read,[{tab0,42}])),
 1239: 
 1240:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, stop, [])),
 1241:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([N2]),
 1242:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:delete_schema([N2])),
 1243:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, start, [[{extra_db_nodes, [N1,N2]}]])),   
 1244:     ?match({timeout,[tab0]}, rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab0], 500])),
 1245: 
 1246:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, start, [[{extra_db_nodes,[N1,N2]}]])),
 1247:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N1, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab0], 1500])),
 1248:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab0], 1500])),
 1249:     ?match([{tab0,42,T}], mnesia2:dirty_read({tab0, 42})),
 1250:     ?match([{tab0,42,T}], rpc:call(N2,mnesia2,dirty_read,[{tab0,42}])),
 1251: 
 1252:     ?verify_mnesia2(Ns, []),
 1253:     ok.
 1254: 
 1255: check_storage(Me, Orig, Other) ->
 1256:     io:format("Nodes ~p ~p ~p~n",[Me,Orig,Other]),
 1257:     rpc:multicall(Other, sys, status, [mnesia2_locker]),
 1258:     rpc:call(Me, sys, status, [mnesia2_locker]),
 1259:     rpc:call(Orig, sys, status, [mnesia2_locker]),
 1260:     rpc:multicall(Other, sys, status, [mnesia2_controller]),
 1261:     rpc:call(Me, sys, status, [mnesia2_controller]),
 1262:     rpc:call(Orig, sys, status, [mnesia2_controller]),
 1263:     %% Verify disc_copies
 1264:     W2C = lists:sort([{Node,disc_copies} || Node <- [Me,Orig|Other]]),
 1265:     W2W = lists:sort([Me,Orig|Other]),
 1266:     ?match(disc_copies, rpc:call(Orig, mnesia2, table_info, [schema, storage_type])),
 1267:     ?match(disc_copies, rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, table_info, [schema, storage_type])),
 1268:     ?match(W2C, lists:sort(rpc:call(Orig, mnesia2, table_info, [schema, where_to_commit]))),
 1269:     ?match(W2C, lists:sort(rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, table_info, [schema, where_to_commit]))),
 1270:     
 1271:     ?match(disc_copies, rpc:call(Orig, mnesia2, table_info, [tab2, storage_type])),
 1272:     ?match(disc_copies, rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, table_info, [tab2, storage_type])),    
 1273:     ?match(W2W, lists:sort(rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, table_info, [tab2, where_to_write]))),    
 1274:     ?match(Me, rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, table_info, [tab2, where_to_read])),    
 1275:     
 1276:     ?match(W2C, lists:sort(rpc:call(Orig, mnesia2, table_info, [tab2, where_to_commit]))),
 1277:     ?match(W2C, lists:sort(rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, table_info, [tab2, where_to_commit]))),
 1278:     
 1279:     ?match([{tab1,1,1}], mnesia2:dirty_read(tab1,1)),
 1280:     ?match([{tab2,1,1}], mnesia2:dirty_read(tab2,1)),
 1281:     ?match([{tab1,1,1}], rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, dirty_read, [tab1,1])),
 1282:     ?match([{tab2,1,1}], rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, dirty_read, [tab2,1])),
 1283: 
 1284:     ?match(true, rpc:call(Me, mnesia2_monitor, use_dir, [])),
 1285:     ?match(disc_copies, rpc:call(Me, mnesia2_lib, val, [{schema, storage_type}])),
 1286:     
 1287:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2([Orig]),
 1288:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Other),
 1289:     T = mnesia2_time:unique_integer(),
 1290:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, dirty_write, [{tab2, 42, T}])),
 1291:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, stop, [])),
 1292:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, start, [])),   
 1293:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:start_mnesia2([Orig|Other], [tab1,tab2])),
 1294:     ?match([{tab2,42,T}], rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, dirty_read, [{tab2, 42}])),
 1295:     ?match([{tab2,42,T}], rpc:call(Orig, mnesia2, dirty_read, [{tab2, 42}])),
 1296:     
 1297:     ?match([{tab1,1,1}], mnesia2:dirty_read(tab1,1)),
 1298:     ?match([{tab2,1,1}], mnesia2:dirty_read(tab2,1)),
 1299:     ?match([{tab1,1,1}], rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, dirty_read, [tab1,1])),
 1300:     ?match([{tab2,1,1}], rpc:call(Me, mnesia2, dirty_read, [tab2,1])),    
 1301:     ok.
 1302:     
 1303: 
 1304: dynamic_bad(suite) ->    [];
 1305: dynamic_bad(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1306:     Ns = [N1, N2, N3] = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1307:     SNs = lists:sort([N2,N3]), 
 1308: 
 1309:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:change_table_copy_type(schema, N2, ram_copies)),
 1310:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:change_table_copy_type(schema, N3, ram_copies)),
 1311:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(tab1, [{ram_copies, Ns -- [N1]},
 1312: 						    {disc_copies, [N1]}])),
 1313:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write({tab1, 1, 1})),
 1314:     
 1315:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Ns),
 1316:     ?match({[ok, ok], []}, rpc:multicall(Ns -- [N1], mnesia2, start, [])),
 1317:     ?match({ok, [N2]}, ?rpc_connect(N3, [N2])),
 1318:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1319:     ?match(SNs, sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia2, system_info, [running_db_nodes]))),
 1320:     ?match({badrpc, {'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, _, _}}}},
 1321: 	   rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, table_info, [tab1, where_to_read])),
 1322:     
 1323:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:start()),
 1324:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, wait_for_tables, [[tab1], 1000])),
 1325:     ?match(N2, rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, table_info, [tab1, where_to_read])), 
 1326:     ?match([{tab1, 1, 1}], rpc:call(N2, mnesia2, dirty_read, [tab1, 1])),
 1327:     
 1328:     mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Ns),
 1329:     ?match({[ok, ok], []}, rpc:multicall(Ns -- [N1], mnesia2, start, [])),
 1330:     ?match({ok, [N2]}, ?rpc_connect(N3, [N2])),
 1331:     % Make a merge conflict
 1332:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(N3, mnesia2, create_table, [tab1, []])),
 1333:     
 1334:     io:format("We expect a mnesia2 crash here~n", []),
 1335:     ?match({error,{_, _}}, mnesia2:start()),
 1336: 
 1337:     ?verify_mnesia2(Ns -- [N1], []),
 1338:     ok.
 1339: 
 1340: 
 1341: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1342: unknown_config(doc) ->
 1343:     ["Try some unknown configuration parameters and see that expected",
 1344:      "things happens."];
 1345: unknown_config(suite)-> [];
 1346: unknown_config(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1347:     ?init(1, Config),
 1348:     %% NOTE: case 1 & 2 below do not respond the same
 1349:     ?match({error, Res} when element(1, Res) == bad_type,
 1350: 	   mnesia2:start([{undefined_config,[]}])),
 1351:     %% Below does not work, but the "correct" behaviour would be to have
 1352:     %% case 1 above to behave as the one below.
 1353: 
 1354:     %% in mnesia2-1.3 {error,{bad_type,{[],undefined_config}}}
 1355:     ?match({error, Res} when element(1, Res) == bad_type,
 1356: 	   mnesia2:start([{[],undefined_config}])),
 1357:     ?cleanup(1, Config),
 1358:     ok.
 1359: 
 1360: 
 1361: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1362: inconsistent_database(doc) ->
 1363:     ["Replace the event module with another module and use it as",
 1364:      "receiver of the various system and table events. Provoke",
 1365:      "coverage of all kinds of events."];
 1366: inconsistent_database(suite) -> [];
 1367: inconsistent_database(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1368:     Nodes = mnesia2_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia2]}], 
 1369: 					      2, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE),
 1370:     KillAfter = length(Nodes) * timer:minutes(5),
 1371:     ?acquire_schema(2, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, KillAfter}]),
 1372: 
 1373:     Ok = [ok || _N <- Nodes],
 1374:     StartArgs = [{event_module, mnesia2_inconsistent_database_test}],
 1375:     ?match({Ok, []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia2, start, [StartArgs])),
 1376:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:kill_mnesia2(Nodes)),
 1377:     
 1378:     ?match(ok, mnesia2_meter:go(ram_copies, Nodes)),
 1379: 
 1380:     mnesia2_test_lib:reload_appls([mnesia2], Nodes),
 1381:     ok.
